column2: the overall literacy levels rose from 64.8 per cent to 74 per cent. Female literacy rates increased at a faster rate (11.79 per cent) than that for males (6.88 per cent)
column3: thus reducing gender gap in literacy from 21.59  to 16.68 percentage points."
